original_text: Ishbosheth Saul's son was forty years old when he began to reign over Israel, and reigned two years. But the house of Judah followed David.
korean_text: 사울의 아들 이스보셋이 이스라엘 왕이 될 때에 나이가 사십 세이며 두 해 동안 왕위에 있으니라 유다 족속은 다윗을 따르니

sentences.original_text: Ishbosheth Saul's son was forty years old
when he began to reign over Israel
But the house of Judah followed David
